text: Paksantare yara abisbasa posana kare tadera kriyakarma marubhumira maricikara n'yaya, pipasarta take pani bale mane kare ye paryanta na se tara kache ase se aitira kichu'i dekhate paya na, baram se allahake tara samane dekhate pabe, sutaram tini tara hisaba cukiye debena. Ara allah hisaba-nikase tatpara.
